title: Free-body diagrams-force of air on hanging sphere

content.prompt: A hollow plastic ball hangs at rest from a string at an angle, as shown. There is a force on the ball from the string directed up and to the left, and a downward gravitational force. There is also a constant flow of air around the ball, and the vector sum of all the forces exerted on the ball is equal to zero. Which of the following statements correctly indicates a possible direction of the force exerted on the ball by the air, and provides a valid justification?

choices.label: To the right, because it will balance the leftward component of the force from the string
To the right, because it will balance the downward gravitational force
Down and to the left, because it will balance the force from the string
Down and to the left, because it will balance the downward gravitational force

skill.text: 3.C: Justify or support a claim using evidence from experimental data, physical representations, or physical principles or laws.
